bs-csyntaxhighlight-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of csyntaxhighlight extension
prefs-csyntaxhighlight:
Used in [[Special:Wiki_Admin&mode=Preferences]], headline for syntax highligther section in preferences.
{{Identical|Syntax highlighter}}
bs-csyntaxhighlight-pref-theme:
Label for option in [[Special:BlueSpice_Preferences]] to change the syntax highlighting theme:
{{Identical|Theme}}
bs-csyntaxhighlight-pref-gutter: Option in [[Special:Wiki_Admin&mode=Preferences]], checkbox label for show line numbers
bs-csyntaxhighlight-pref-autolinks: Checkbox label for setting in [[Special:BlueSpice_Preferences]]. If checked, URLs in the highlighted text are converted to linked tags.
bs-csyntaxhighlight-pref-toolbar: Option in [[Special:Wiki_Admin&mode=Preferences]], checkbox label for show toolbar
bs-csyntaxhighlight-tag-desc: Used in InsertMagic extension, description of the tag that displays formatted code snippets.
